title: So About Plastic Straws... : r/australia - Reddit
body: I've been on a trip to America these past few months and have become re-enchanted by plastic straws. I was trying to find out if there was any possible way for me to bring some back. Paper straws suck, metal straws upset me and even the silicon ones don't feel right. Plastic ones are the only ones that don't give me sensory issues.
